features.featureTitle: Completely delete the current contents of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` and replace the entire file with the exact V7000 “NEXUS INFINITY” code provided by the user (verbatim replacement as the complete app UI/logic: Landing → Client Explorer → Pro App stub), including the in-file datasets (`CATEGORIES`, `PRO_DB`), the discovery engine (category rail + distance sort toggle + list/map dual view), the client bottom dock, the booking modal overlay, and the localStorage brain using the key `nexus_v7000`.

Ensure the V7000 `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` implementation compiles and runs in this repository by applying only minimal mechanical fixes required by the repo wiring/dependencies (e.g., missing/incorrect imports, undefined identifiers referenced in JSX, invalid JSX, duplicate default exports) without changing the intended V7000 UI layout, styling (Tailwind classes), copy, datasets, or interaction behavior.
